sense.def:
A vehicle
je stroj z motorjem, na primer avtomobil ali avtobus, ki prevaža ljudi ali stvari iz kraja v kraj.

seg.quote: We saw a vehicle travelling across the bridge.

sense.def:
A vehicle
je tudi nekaj, kar uporabimo, da dosežemo določen cilj;

seg.quote: They saw education as a vehicle of liberation.
They support the Labour Party as a vehicle for socialism.
